title: How much money should I pay to Google Play before releasing an Android app? - Quora

response.answer_text: A one time fee of $25 must be payed to create a Developer Account to publish Android apps in Google Play. The plus side is that you only need to pay once and then can publish as many games as you want, not $25 per game. Games I’ve published: The Last Tower, Spike-O-Ball

At the starting u want to create a account in google application as a app developrler and then u need to pay around 20–25$ at the reg fee for the app for some app it may increase or decreased depends on the company policy .. Thank you all the best.
